title: KPop Demon Hunters Mira Youtooz Vinyl Figure
body_html:
Watch out, demons, Mira's here to seal you away with her Youtooz debut!

Standing at 4.7 inches tall with her hip popped to the side as she holds the hilt and blade of the long gok-do flung over her shoulder, her lips rest slightly open as a pink fringe parts in the middle to frame her face and sweep across her shoulders. Dressed in an elegant gold-trimmed white jacket over a simple tank top, along with a short skirt, light purple and blue patterns run up her sleeves as she wears platform ankle boots.

The exterior of her packaging sees a glowing gok-do amongst hazy pink and blue hues, while the interior is filled with a deep blue that's covered in small white dots. The protective sleeve is then a soft blue to purple gradient with thin lines wrapping over its surface, as her figure can be seen through the large, clear window at the packaging's front. This collectible ships in a matte, embossed, protective outer sleeve and a custom-sized plastic protector for maximum protection during shipping.

  • Preorder figure is non-refundable
  • Size: Height: 4.7"
